text: Mary Gay Scanlon (born August 30, 1959) is an American attorney and politician. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She has been a member of the U.S. House of Representatives since 2018. Scanlon was born in Syracuse, New York. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congresswoman Mary Gay Scanlon official U.S. House website * Mary Gay Scanlon for Congress official campaign website * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Politicians from Syracuse, New York Category:Lawyers from New York (state) Category:Lawyers from Pennsylvania Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Mary Gay Scanlon
